item.title: Launch the openldap and dex in kubernetes
item.description: Generate the PKI for openldap Caution: the certificate’s subject's domain component (DC) can with openldap DN same to name 1# install the certtool 2apt install gnutls-bin 3# generate the ca.key 4certtool --generate-privkey --outfile ca.key 5# generate the ca certificate 6certtool --generate-self-signed --load-privkey ca.key --outfile ca.crt 7# generate the server endpoint private key 8certtool --generate-privkey --outfile tls.key --rsa 9# server endpoint certificate request 10certtool --generate-request --load-privkey tls.key --outfile request.crt 11# use ca certificate to sign the server endpoint certificate 12certtool --generate-certificate --load-request request.
